Memberships
Memberships
Boca Dunes Golf and Country Club offers a fantastic membership experience at a great value.
Take Advantage of A Boca Dunes Membership!
With your golf membership at Boca Dunes, you’ll experience great value for your golfing dollar, in addition to superb golfing conditions, first-class amenities, special events and more! Above all…an
18 Hole Executive Golf Course
.
At Boca Dunes Country Club we have a membership program to fit your needs and a golf experience of a lifetime.
2025 Extended Summer Membership $40.00+ tax
Click Here to Download Membership Application
Call 561-451-1600 or
Click here to Email Us
for more information.

Welcome to Boca Dunes Golf & Country Club
From the ceremony to the reception, we’ve got you covered! Discover the perfect event space at our versatile venue, featuring a beautiful outdoor garden, inside ceremony room and three distinct rooms to accommodate all types of gatherings. Whether you're planning an intimate event for 30 guests or a grand celebration for up to 200, we have the ideal space to bring your vision to life.  With customizable food and beverage packages, as well as rental options,
Boca Dunes Country Club is your ultimate event destination!
Virtual Tour
Scan the QR to Explore our beautiful Boca Dunes Country Club.
Diamond Room
Experience the charm of our Diamond Room, which can host up to 200 attendees. Featuring beautiful alcove ceiling lights, a permanent dance floor and magnificent chandeliers, it is the ideal setting for your upcoming event. Together, we can craft magical moments! Let’s create some magical memories together!
Emerald Room
Step into the beauty of our Emerald Room, designed to host up to 150 guests. This remarkable venue features all-around ceiling lights and a permanent dance floor, making it the perfect backdrop for your special occasion. Let’s make your event truly memorable!
Palm Room
Explore the beauty of our Palm Room, which can host up to 75 guests in style. With enchanting ceiling lights, a permanent dance floor, and an adjacent outdoor patio, it is the perfect venue for your next event. Let’s make unforgettable memories together!
Wedding Garden
Step into our beautiful outdoor wedding garden, where every ceremony finds its perfect backdrop. Whether it’s a wedding, bar mitzvah, graduation, or any outdoor celebration, we are here to make your event extraordinary.
Inside Ceremony Room
Discover our stunning inside ceremony room, an ideal setting for all types of celebrations. From weddings to bar mitzvahs and graduations, this beautiful space is tailored to make your special day truly remarkable.
Bridal Suite & Groom's Lounge
Experience the ultimate convenience on your special day with our stunning bridal suite and grooms lounge. Enjoy the luxury of getting ready on-site and seamlessly transition to your event without any hassle.
Everything you need is right here for your perfect day!
Event Specials and Rentals
Wedding Specials
Boca Dunes is your ultimate destination for wedding planning. We offer a full range of services from the ceremony to the reception, ensuring a stress-free experience. With our wedding specials and customizable menus, we can work within any budget. Have a wedding date in mind? Let’s make your dream day a reality!
Wedding Specials
Sweet Sixteens &
Quinceañeras
Celebrate your Sweet 16 or Quinceañera in style at Boca Dunes! With 3 unique event spaces for 30-200 guests and fabulous decor packages, we’ve got everything you need for an unforgettable event.  Let’s start planning your dream celebration!
Sweet 16 & Quince Specials
Social Events & More
Boca Dunes is your premier destination for all types of events! Whether it's a baby shower, anniversary, graduation, Bar Mitzvah, or corporate gathering, we have the perfect space for you. Choose from three stunning event venues accommodating 30 to 200 guests, complete with exquisite decor packages. With packages and customized options to fit any budget, we are dedicated to making your event truly memorable. Let’s celebrate together!
Social Specials
Rentals
Elevate your event at Boca Dunes Golf & Country Club, where we provide three unique event rooms, a charming indoor ceremony space, and a scenic outdoor wedding garden. Please ensure that all food is catered by licensed and insured providers, and that all vendors meet these requirements. Liquor must be purchased through our venue. Start planning your special event with us today!
Rental Specials
Frequently Asked Questions
What types of events do you specialize in?
We specialize in a wide range of events, including weddings, sweet sixteens, q
uinceañeras, baby showers,
corporate functions, social gatherings and more.
Can I customize the menu for my event?
Yes, we work with you to create a menu that reflects your tastes and preferences.
Do you provide staffing for events?
Yes, we provide professional staffing services to ensure your event runs smoothly and seamlessly.
“Boca Dunes Country Club made our wedding day truly magical. The food was delicious, the presentation was stunning, and the service was impeccable. We couldn't be happier with our choice!”
[Morgan G.]
Need Event Information?
For inquiries, pricing or to check date availability, please fill out the form below, and we’ll get back to you promptly.
Click Here To Request  Event Information
Location
Boca Dunes Golf & Country Club
1400 SW 65th Ave,
Boca Raton, FL 33428
bocadunescatering.com
Boca Raton, Florida, United States
About us
Boca Dunes Catering is a premier event venue based in Boca Raton, Florida. With years of experience in the industry, we have established ourselves as a trusted partner for creating unforgettable events. From weddings, social events to corporate functions, we strive to exceed our clients' expectations with every event we plan.
Contact Us

Address:
1400 Country Club Drive, Boca Raton, FL 33428

Location & Directions
Special Events
Welcome to Boca Dunes Golf & Country Club!
Boca Dunes Executive Course a par 62 with eight par 4’s and ten par 3’s. New tiff-eagle greens, lush landscaping, and continuous concrete cart paths throughout the entire course. The course has been designed to accommodate golfers of all skill levels. The clubhouse features spectacular ballrooms with sweeping views of the golf course. We have a beautiful veranda overlooking the wedding garden as well as breath-taking golf course views – a perfect spot for your cocktail and hors d’oeuvres receptions.
Before you tee off or after you finish your round, stop by our pro shop! We have a nice selection of apparel and accessories. Names like Titleist, FootJoy, and Srixon assure you that you’re buying the best at affordable prices. Food and beverages are conveniently located in the pro shop for you to grab and go on your way out. Don’t forget to enjoy a cold beer after your round on our patio!
Special Events
Boca Dunes Country Club offers the finest special event facilities in the Boca Raton area.
We offer full service catering, trained catering and event professionals will help you with a menu your guests will love. We have the experience and facility to accommodate 30-200 guests. Cocktails can be served on our veranda while your guests enjoy the golf course view. Your event will be set beautifully in one of our four banquet rooms. Whether it’s a wedding, bar/bat mitzvah, social event or any celebration, we think of every detail so you don’t.
Our professional event staff is ready to help plan your special day!  For a private tour and consultation contact our events department
561-451-1600 ext. 116 or
Click Here to Email Us!
